Salamence (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0372: Shelgon
Pokémon
#0374: Beldum →

Salamence has been featured on 23 different cards since it debuted in the EX Dragon expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Salamence cards are normally Colorless-type or Dragon-type Stage 2 Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Salamence

Salamence
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
